text:
I have two new posts today

This first one makes sure you don't accidentally break your CSS by minifying without the `{% raw %}` tag: <https://www.fasterbetter.dev/blog/HubSpot-webpack/safe-minification>

The second one is about making Webpack manage files in a way that doesn't fight HubSpot: <https://www.fasterbetter.dev/blog/HubSpot-webpack/add-glob>
it looks like either webpack or webpack-cli is not installed. If you run `npm i webpack webpack-cli --save-dev` is it successful?

<@U26B530N6> thanks for the input. Iâ€™ve ran the code you gave me, and now have the webpack-cli within my package file.  `"devDependencies": { "webpack": "^5.46.0", "webpack-cli": "^4.7.2" }`  However, still getting the same error :disappointed:.
